articles.title: 10 foods that have more magnesium than pumpkin seeds - Recipes
articles.description: While roasted pumpkin seeds are indeed a good source of magnesium, there are several other foods that contain even higher levels of this essential mineral. Here are 10 foods that have more magnesium than pumpkin seeds.
articles.content: Magnesium is vital for optimal health as it supports hundreds of biochemical reactions in the body, including muscle and nerve function, energy production, protein synthesis, and maintaining strong b… [+24 chars]
